segments.text: Is this the foreign exchange department ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of currency have you got ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: RIB . By the way , what is the exchange rate today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One US Dollars in cash is equivalent t0 7.9 Yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I want to change 4000 Yuan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Minus the fee . Here are your dollars . Please sign here .
segments.speaker: S2
